Imagination

Those of us who grow through childhood with an imagination that flies will sonner or later experience a grounding that some never come back from. It is those who are creatives that are readily able to recover their flight.

These are those with an understanding of not only complex ideals, but are those of resilience for persisting beyond a system that craves to produce gears. Instead they have grown wings and fly to new horizons. Congratulations! You made it!
